name: RESISTANCE (Liza)
description:
Bacteria are taking over Liza's gut! And because she didn't finish her prescribed antibiotics as recommended, they've started developing antibiotic resistance. Enter ABX2017, a tiny experimental robot soldier tasked with finding and killing Liza's pathogenic (bad!) bacteria. Can ABX2017 save Liza, or will she die a horrible death from her bacterial infection? Anyway, this game is for kids!

Game design and UI - Angela Gao
Programming - Patrick Price
Art and music - Liza Knipscher
